name: The Wizard's Treasure (Maayan)
description:
Controls:

Move - A, D

jump / continue dialogue - Space Bar

Climb - W

Open Camera - E

Fullscreen is recommended.

Made in 6 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 Theme - It Is Not Real.

This is my first ever published game, hope you enjoy!

If you have any questions you can contact me on Discord - maayan#8007
